# Create new chunks with shortcuts

.kbd[Ctrl] + .kbd[Alt] + .kbd[I] (.kbd[Cmd] + .kbd[Option] + .kbd[I] on macOS)

.center[
![:scale 80%](images/new-chunk.gif)
]

---

# Split existing chunks withshortcuts

.kbd[Ctrl] + .kbd[Alt] + .kbd[I] (.kbd[Cmd] + .kbd[Option] + .kbd[I] on macOS)

.center[
![:scale 80%](images/split-chunk.gif)
]

---

# Swap between Source and Console

- .kbd[Ctrl] + .kbd[1]: focus on source file
- .kbd[Ctrl] + .kbd[2]: focus on console

---

# Swap between Source and Console

- .kbd[Ctrl] + .kbd[Shift] + .kbd[1] = focus on source file AND make maximize that window
- .kbd[Ctrl] + .kbd[Shift] + .kbd[2] = focus on console AND maximize that window

---

# Multiple cursors

.kbd[Ctrl] + .kbd[Alt] + {.kbd[Up]/.kbd[Down]} (.kbd[Ctrl] + .kbd[option] + {.kbd[Up]/.kbd[Down]} for MacOS)

.center[
![:scale 80%](images/multcursor.gif)
]

---

# Rectangular select

Hold .kbd[Alt] (.kbd[option] for MacOS) and drag

.center[
![:scale 80%](images/drag-select.gif)
]

---

# Inspect data set

.kbd[command] + click -> `Viewer()`
